description.plain: The Migos are an American hip-hop trio comprised of Quavo, Offset, and Takeoff. All three artists are signed to Quality Control Music, and have been featured on several songs from both of the label’s compilation tapes.

body.plain: The Migos are an American hip-hop trio comprised of Quavo, Offset, and Takeoff. All three artists are signed to Quality Control Music, and have been featured on several songs from both of the label’s compilation tapes.

songs.full_title: Too Hotty by Quality Control & Migos (Ft. Eurielle)
songs.title: Too Hotty

description.plain: Like an homage to John Wick, Migos drop this long waited track where Offset teased on his IG back in December 12, 2016. It was believe to be a track that was going to be on the Culture Album as Offset had us also believing, however the track wasn’t on the Album but the fans effortlessly flocked to Offset IG on the snippet, asking the rapper to drop the track along with question to if it’s an Offset single or Migos track. It was finally release on the Quality Control YouTube page. Scotty 2 Hotty is an professional wrestler, signed to WWE, where he started his early wrestling career in WWF(World Wrestling Federation)

songs.embed_content: Read “Too Hotty” by Quality Control & Migos on Genius

body.plain: Like an homage to John Wick, Migos drop this long waited track where Offset teased on his IG back in December 12, 2016. It was believe to be a track that was going to be on the Culture Album as Offset had us also believing, however the track wasn’t on the Album but the fans effortlessly flocked to Offset IG on the snippet, asking the rapper to drop the track along with question to if it’s an Offset single or Migos track. It was finally release on the Quality Control YouTube page. Scotty 2 Hotty is an professional wrestler, signed to WWE, where he started his early wrestling career in WWF(World Wrestling Federation)

128 ContributorsToo Hotty Lyrics[Intro: Offset]
